analysis.key_quote: I am deeply concerned that the text of this rule does not do what it promises in the summary; this rule actually undermines the foundational principles of the merit-based civil service system established by the Pendleton Act of 1883.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based hiring, politicization of the civil service, and potential legal issues, which align with the themes of opposition to the rule.
